trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 的外观

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify settings such as color, width, transparency, and the shape of the stylus tip for a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>属性，以指定设置，如颜色、 宽度、 透明度、 和的触笔提示形状<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> property to specify the drawing attributes for the strokes added to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>属性指定用于添加到描边的绘制特性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: Only strokes that are added after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> undergo change show the updated attributes.
trans-unit.target: 只有之后添加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>进行更新的特性的更改显示。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the strokes that are already on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 笔画上已有的外观<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>不会更改。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> 构造函数。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 此类不常在 XAML 中使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects to simulate using a pen and a highlighter on the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象以模拟使用上相同的钢笔和突出显示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes the root element in the XAML file is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> called `root`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定的 XAML 文件中的根元素是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>调用`root`。

trans-unit.source: It also assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> called `switchHighlighter` and that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event is connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: 它还假定没有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>调用`switchHighlighter`且<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件连接到在此示例中定义的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> 类的某个实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: Black
trans-unit.target: 黑色

trans-unit.source: 2 device independent pixels (DIP)
trans-unit.target: 2 设备无关的像素 (DIP)

trans-unit.source: 2 DIP
trans-unit.target: 2 DIP

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> to associate with the custom property.
trans-unit.target: 要与自定义属性关联的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: 此自定义属性的值。

trans-unit.source: <c>propertyData</c> must be of type <see cref="T:System.Char" />, <see cref="T:System.Byte" />, <see cref="T:System.Int16" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt16" />, <see cref="T:System.Int32" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt32" />, <see cref="T:System.Int64" />, <see cref="T:System.UInt64" />, <see cref="T:System.Single" />, <see cref="T:System.Double" />, <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />, <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />, <see cref="T:System.String" />, <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> or an array of these data types; however it cannot be an array of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>propertyData</c> 必须为 <see cref="T:System.Char" />、<see cref="T:System.Byte" />、<see cref="T:System.Int16" />、<see cref="T:System.UInt16" />、<see cref="T:System.Int32" />、<see cref="T:System.UInt32" />、<see cref="T:System.Int64" />、<see cref="T:System.UInt64" />、<see cref="T:System.Single" />、<see cref="T:System.Double" />、<see cref="T:System.DateTime" />、<see cref="T:System.Boolean" />、<see cref="T:System.String" />、<see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 类型或以上数据类型的数组，但不能为 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将一个自定义属性添加到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AddPropertyData%2A> method enables you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AddPropertyData%2A>方法使您能够添加到自定义属性<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you render your own strokes and want to provide extra information.
trans-unit.target: 呈现自己描边，并希望提供额外信息时，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add and retrieve a custom property from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何添加和检索自定义属性从<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象。

trans-unit.source: The example adds a property that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object is a pen or a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: 该示例将添加一个属性，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是钢笔或突出显示。

trans-unit.source: The code in the `ChangeColors_Click` event handler renders a new color for strokes on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> that use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object, `inkDA`.
trans-unit.target: 中的代码`ChangeColors_Click`事件处理程序将描边的新颜色呈现在上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象， `inkDA`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> named `inkCanvas1`, and that there are two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects named `inkDA`, and `highlighterDA.`
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>名为`inkCanvas1`，并且有两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象命名的`inkDA`，和 `highlighterDA.`

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyData" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyData" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> is an empty <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> 是一个空的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyData" /> is not one of the allowed data types listed in the <see langword="Parameters" /> section.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyData" /> 不是 <see langword="Parameters" /> 部分列出的允许数据类型之一。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object changes.
trans-unit.target: 当更改 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象的属性时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例处理<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object called `inkDA` and that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged> event is connected to the event handler defined in this example.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>调用对象`inkDA`且<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged>事件连接到在此示例中定义的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 复制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Clone%2A> method creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object and populates it with the same values as the current object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Clone%2A>方法创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象并使用与当前对象相同的值填充它。

trans-unit.source: Any custom properties are also copied.
trans-unit.target: 也将复制任何自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to copy a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将复制<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The color of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 的颜色。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中，通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你的应用程序具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`，和两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象称为`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object .
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象中查找的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified property data identifier is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示指定的属性数据标识符是否在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified property data identifier is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的属性数据标识符在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add and retrieve a custom property from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何添加和检索自定义属性从<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象。

trans-unit.source: The example adds a property that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object is a pen or a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: 该示例将添加一个属性，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是钢笔或突出显示。

trans-unit.source: The `ChangeColors_Click` event handler changes all the strokes that were put on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> with a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> called `inkDA` to a new color.
trans-unit.target: `ChangeColors_Click`事件处理程序更改将放置在所有笔画<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>与<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>调用`inkDA`到一种新颜色。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> named `inkCanvas1`, and that there are two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects named `inkDA`, and `highlighterDA.`
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>名为`inkCanvas1`，并且有两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象命名的`inkDA`，和 `highlighterDA.`

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象是否等同于当前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal:
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是否相等的以下属性是否相等：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A> method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A>方法不会检查是否相等的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例比较两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> properties on `attributes1` and `attributes2` are set to the same values, the "The DrawingAttributes are equal" message appears.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>属性`attributes1`和`attributes2`设置为相同的值，将显示"DrawingAttributes 是否相等的"消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Bezier smoothing is used to render the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用贝塞尔曲线平滑法来呈现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use Bezier smoothing to render the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用贝塞尔曲线平滑法来呈现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中，通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你的应用程序具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`，和两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象称为`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 用作特定类型的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the custom property to get.
trans-unit.target: 与要获取的自定义属性关联的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the custom property associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 关联的自定义属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: 与指定 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 关联的自定义属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.GetPropertyData%2A> method to access custom properties you added to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.GetPropertyData%2A>方法来访问自定义属性添加到<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.GetPropertyData%2A> returns the default value for the built-in property if a value has not been set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.GetPropertyData%2A> 如果尚未设置一个值，则返回的内置属性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add and retrieve a custom property from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何添加和检索自定义属性从<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象。

trans-unit.source: The example adds a property that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object is a pen or a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: 该示例将添加一个属性，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是钢笔或突出显示。

trans-unit.source: The code in the `ChangeColors_Click` event handler renders a new color for strokes on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> that use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object, `inkDA`.
trans-unit.target: 中的代码`ChangeColors_Click`事件处理程序将描边的新颜色呈现在上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象， `inkDA`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> named `inkCanvas1`, and that there are two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects named `inkDA`, and `highlighterDA.`
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>名为`inkCanvas1`，并且有两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象命名的`inkDA`，和 `highlighterDA.`

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> is not associated with a custom property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> 不与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象的自定义属性关联。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GUIDs of any custom properties associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> 关联的任何自定义属性的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents the property data identifiers.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 类型的数组，表示属性数据的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The GUIDs for the built-in properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class are in the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds> class.
trans-unit.target: 内置属性的 Guid<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>类位于<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributeIds>类。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the property data identifiers from the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何获取属性数据的标识符从<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> called `inkDA` has been declared.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>调用`inkDA`已声明。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the stylus used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 的触笔的高度。

trans-unit.source: The value that indicates the height of the stylus used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 的触笔高度的值。

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以下因素影响的高度和宽度<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>呈现时，但不是值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 应用于触笔的压力量时<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>绘制。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>属性到 0 设备无关的像素 (DIP)，它将更改为 2 的 DIP。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中，通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你的应用程序具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`，和两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象称为`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" /> property is less than <see cref="F:System.Double.Epsilon" /> or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" /> 属性小于 <see cref="F:System.Double.Epsilon" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the thickness of a rendered <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> changes according the amount of pressure applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示呈现的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 的粗细是否会随应用的压力而更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the thickness of the stroke is uniform; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the thickness of a rendered <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> increases when pressure is increased.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 <see langword="true" />，则表示笔画的粗细是相同的；如果是 <see langword="false" />，则表示呈现的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 的粗细会随着压力增大而变粗。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中，通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IgnorePressure%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你的应用程序具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`，和两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象称为`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> looks like a highlighter.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 看起来是否像一支荧光笔。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to render the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> as a highlighter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 作为荧光笔呈现，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is slightly transparent, which allows the strokes underneath to appear.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>是稍微透明，这样，下层的笔画显示。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中，通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.IsHighlighter%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你的应用程序具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`，和两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象称为`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。

trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the largest value allowed for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" /> 属性所允许的最大值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MaxHeight> field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MaxHeight>字段以检查值是否在允许的限制内<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: 当该值来自未知源，例如不受约束的用户输入，则执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The following example ensures the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> is set to a legal value.

trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MaxWidth> field to check whether a value is within the limits allowed for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MaxWidth>字段以检查值是否在允许的限制内<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: 当该值来自未知源，例如不受约束的用户输入，则执行此操作。

trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the smallest value allowed for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height" /> 属性所允许的最小值。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MinHeight>字段以检查值是否在允许的限制内<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Do this when the value comes from an unknown source, such as unconstrained user input.
trans-unit.target: 当该值来自未知源，例如不受约束的用户输入，则执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The following example ensures the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> is set to a legal value.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例将确保<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>设置为的合法值。

trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.MinWidth>字段以检查值是否在允许的限制内<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 以下示例将确保<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>设置为的合法值。

trans-unit.target: 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.AttributeChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> method for the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" />在派生类中，调用<see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnAttributeChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" />方法的基类，以确保，注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: EventArgs
trans-unit.target: EventArgs

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当任何 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, call the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" /> method for the base class to ensure registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" />在派生类中，调用<see cref="M:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.OnPropertyDataChanged(System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs)" />方法的基类，以确保已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are equal if the following properties are equal:
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是否相等的以下属性是否相等：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.op_Equality%2A> method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.op_Equality%2A>方法不会检查是否相等的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例比较两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> properties on `attributes1` and `attributes2` are set to the same values, the "The DrawingAttributes are equal" message appears.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>属性`attributes1`和`attributes2`设置为相同的值，将显示"DrawingAttributes 是否相等的"消息。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象不相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects are not equal if the following properties are not equal:
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是否不相等，如果以下属性是否不相等：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.op_Inequality%2A> method does not check the custom properties for equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.op_Inequality%2A>方法不会检查是否相等的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is the negation of <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是求反运算的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例比较两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> properties on `attributes1` and `attributes2` are set to the same values, the "The DrawingAttributes are equal" message appears.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Color%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Height%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>属性`attributes1`和`attributes2`设置为相同的值，将显示"DrawingAttributes 是否相等的"消息。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when property data is added or removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 在属性数据添加至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> 或从其中移除时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a custom stroke that can draw a three-dimensional effect.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是可以绘制三维效果的自定义笔画的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The stroke defines and stores a custom property called `Shadowed`, which belongs to <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 笔画定义并存储名为的自定义属性`Shadowed`，属于<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawingAttributes%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When the `Shadowed` property changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged> event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A> method, which causes the stroke to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 当`Shadowed`属性更改<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.PropertyDataChanged>事件处理程序调用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.OnInvalidated%2A>方法，这会导致重绘的笔划。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the custom property to remove.
trans-unit.target: 与要移除的自定义属性相关联的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the custom property associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除与指定 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 关联的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to remove a custom property from a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了如何删除自定义属性从<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> is not associated with a custom property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyDataId" /> 不与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes" /> 对象的自定义属性关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shape of the stylus used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 的触笔的形状。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中，通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTip%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你的应用程序具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`，和两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象称为`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" />，它指定要在触笔笔尖上执行的变换。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> that specifies the transformation to perform on the stylus' tip.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" />，用于指定要在触笔笔尖上执行的变换。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property to rotate, skew, or scale the stylus tip.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>属性来旋转、 倾斜或缩放触笔提示。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中，通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你的应用程序具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`，和两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象称为`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The matrix set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform" /> is not an invertible matrix.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform" /> 的矩阵不是可逆矩阵。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY" /> property of the matrix is not zero.
trans-unit.target: 矩阵的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY" /> 属性不为零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the stylus used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 的触笔的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the stylus used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> 的触笔的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The following factors affect the height and width of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> when it is rendered, but not the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以下因素影响的高度和宽度<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>呈现时，但不是值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 应用于触笔的压力量时<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>绘制。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform%2A> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>属性到 0 设备无关的像素 (DIP)，它将更改为 2 的 DIP。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中，通常不使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that your application has an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1`, and two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定你的应用程序具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`，和两个<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>对象称为`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width" /> property is less than <see cref="F:System.Double.Epsilon" /> or <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width" /> 属性小于 <see cref="F:System.Double.Epsilon" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。
